name: The Extravagant Bill
description:
The Extravagant Bill is a figure head contest between two players. You shall win if you have the most expensive hat by the end of the timer. But will they be stable enough to support all this fancy ?

Thank you for playing !

Credit  :

Art : Roxane Campoy & Noémi Gruner

Code & Music : Arthur Bourdot

Code : Bragou

EDIT :

- You can now also play with two gamePads.

- Best in Windows Application rather playing it on browser.
